Ander leva uma vida rotineira, cuidando de seu pedaÃƒÂ§o de terra, onde vive com a mÃƒÂ£e e a irmÃƒÂ£, e trabalhando como operÃƒÂ¡rio numa fÃƒÂ¡brica de bicicletas. Certo dia, ele sofre um acidente e quebra a perna. Contra a vontade da mÃƒÂ£e, a famÃƒÂ­lia contrata um jovem peruano para tocar as tarefas caseiras. A presenÃƒÂ§a de JosÃƒÂ© muda o ritmo do lugar e muda principalmente a vida de Ander, que passa a ter sentimentos atÃƒÂ© entÃƒÂ£o desconhecidos, o que provoca conflitos internos. Suas relaÃƒÂ§ÃƒÂµes com Peio, o melhor amigo, e com Reme, a prostituta da comarca, tambÃƒÂ©m tomam novos rumos com a chegada de JosÃƒÂ© e levam Ander a tomar uma posiÃƒÂ§ÃƒÂ£o.

The valley of Arratia in August 1999. Ander, a farmer well into his forties, lives with his sister Arantxa and his old mother in a remote part of rural Basque country. His is a monotonous life filled with nothing but farm work and a job at the local bicycle factory. It won't be long before Arantxa gets married and leaves home and then Ander will be left to look after their stubborn mother on his own. Then one day Ander has an accident and breaks his leg. His limb will be in a plaster cast for two months. Against his mother's wishes, the family decides to employ a Peruvian immigrant, JosÃƒÂ©, in order to help out. The arrival of the new farm hand has an influence on interpersonal relationships within the family. The old woman, who barely speaks any Spanish, refuses to communicate with JosÃƒÂ©, but Arantxa and Ander soon get to know JosÃƒÂ© quite well. The two men in particular become firm friends. After attending Arantxa's fiancÃƒÂ©s' stag night the men both wind up having sex with a prostitute, Reme. Reme is from Galicia. She is a single mother and very much an outsider, which means that she and JosÃƒÂ© quickly bond. Without realising it, Ander also begins to seek out JosÃƒÂ©'s company more often. When he invites JosÃƒÂ© to Arantxa's wedding this leads to a serious clash with his mother. And then, at a completely unexpected moment, a sexual encounter occurs between the two men...

Ander es una pelÃƒÂ­cula sobre la vida rural vasca. Un dÃƒÂ­a, el personaje principal, se rompe una pierna y, contra su voluntad, su hermana y su madre deciden contratar a un joven peruano para que lo reemplace en el trabajo del campo. La llegada del inmigrante (Christian Esquivel) trastoca la vida de Ander (Joxean Bengoetxea), especialmente porque empieza a generarle sentimientos y emociones que prefiere no aceptar.
